courtOfCommonPleas.name: Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County

fees.notes: Philadelphia County has eliminated most expungement filing fees. There is no cost to file an expungement petition. Clean Slate sealing is always free.

cleanSlateStatus.processingVolume: Philadelphia processes over 50% of all Pennsylvania expungements
cleanSlateStatus.verification: Check status at courts.phila.gov or PA State Police
cleanSlateStatus.automaticSealing: Court system automatically processes eligible records
cleanSlateStatus.contactForIssues: Contact Expungement Unit if sealed records still appear

procedures.filingLocation: File expungement petitions at the Criminal Justice Center, Room 268
procedures.daNotification: Court will forward copy to District Attorney's office automatically
procedures.hearingRequired: Hearings rarely required for uncontested petitions
procedures.hearingLocation: Criminal Justice Center if hearing scheduled
specialNotes: Philadelphia has a dedicated Expungement Unit

Filing is FREE in Philadelphia County

timeline.hearingNotice: 2-3 weeks advance notice if hearing required
timeline.cleanSlateProcessing: Automatic sealing processed on rolling basis

forms.whereToObtain: Available at Clerk's office or online
additionalForms: Affidavit of Indigency (if requesting fee waiver - usually not needed as filing is free)
Verification of Payment of Court Costs
